name: The Cave of Lights
description:
The Cave of Lights is...

An original puzzler-adventure game full of challenging levels and mysterious secrets. 

Help our cute little hero solve each level using only 10 seconds of light, spend them wisely!
Each level requires puzzle-solving skills and good memory.

Key Features
  • Original 10 seconds of light puzzle mechanic
  • Hand-crafted challenging levels
  • 4 boss levels
  • 30 hidden secrets to be found
  • *secret* bonus levels
  • Hours of game-play
  • A mysterious ending
